entry.title: Bitcoin To $200,000 By 2025 End Is ‚ÄòConservative‚Äô Target, Analyst Predicts
entry.summary:
According to institutional-grade research firm Bernstein analysts, Bitcoin (BTC) reaching $200,000 by the end of 2025 would be a ‚Äúconservative‚Äù estimate.
Bitcoin To $200,000 By 2025 End?
Although BTC remains range-bound, just below its all-time high (ATH) of $73,737, analysts at Bernstein believe their current price prediction of $200,000 for the digital asset by the end of 2025 is conservative.
In a client note shared today, Bernstein analyst Gautam Chhugani wrote, ‚ÄúBitcoin is going to $200,000 this cycle,‚Äù emphasizing the significance of the asset‚Äôs limited supply of 21 million, particularly in light of inflating US debt levels. He added:

entry.title: Litecoin Records Highest Volume Since May 2023, Bullish Sign?
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows Litecoin has recently recorded its highest weekly volume since May 2023. Here‚Äôs what this could mean for the asset‚Äôs price.
Litecoin Transaction Volume Has Been Rising Recently
In a new post on X, Jay Milla, the director of marketing at Litecoin Foundation, has pointed out that the LTC network has witnessed a large amount of transaction volume during the past week. The ‚Äútransaction volume‚Äù here refers to an on-chain metric that keeps track of the total amount of Litecoin that‚Äôs becoming involved in transactions on the network every day.
When the value of this metric is high, it means the users are moving around large amounts on the blockchain. Such a trend implies the trading interest in the asset is high among the investors.

Vietnam has taken a significant step towards advancing its blockchain ecosystem by releasing its National Blockchain Strategy.

The strategy aligns with the goals of the Fourth Industrial Revolution, a global initiative to integrate major technologies into economies.

entry.title: Bitcoin Developer Peter Todd Fears Harassment, Goes Into Hiding After HBO Docu
entry.summary:
A former Bitcoin developer refuted allegations that he is the real Satoshi Nakamoto, creator of Bitcoin, after an HBO documentary pinpointed him as the Bitcoin mastermind.
Peter Todd, who claimed the documentary falsely identifies him as Satoshi, believed that it is pointless to know who the Bitcoin founder is, considering Bitcoin has thrived despite the founder‚Äôs true identity, which remains shrouded in mystery.
‚ÄòA False Claim‚Äô
Todd criticized the documentary‚Äôs filmmaker for accusing him of being Satoshi, saying that it is a false claim.
He lamented that the film put him in the spotlight of public scrutiny despite his constant denial that he is the Bitcoin founder.
According to Todd, the HBO filmmaker used the Satoshi accusation to market his documentary, saying the director n‚Ä¶

Grayscale reveals 35 altcoins considered for funds. Ethena proposes SOL for USDe collateral. Only one Binance launchpad coin up this year. AVAX summit begins this week.

entry.title: Crypto Falls Ahead of CPI, Stripe Reinstates Crypto, Fed Charges Market-makers
entry.summary: Majors drop despite stocks hitting ATHs. Stripe reinstates crypto payments. Crypto settlements near $20bn in 2024. S. Korea to review ban on BTC ETFs. US charges market makers for market manipulation. FBI created their own coin to ensnare targets. Vitalik ‚Äòoutside pick‚Äô for Nobel Prize. Trump family token to built on Aave stack. $16m OP tokens allocated to superchain users. Wisdomtree debuts debit card for on-chain fund. 47% of hedge funds have crypto exposure. Argentina overtakes Brazil for crypto inflows. Tucker interviews Ryan Salame over FTX.

entry.title: Todd ‚Äòrevealed‚Äô as Satoshi, Google may be Broken-up, Murad‚Äôs Wallets Doxxed
entry.summary: BTC will be range bound until election: Bernstein. TAO & memecoins dominate mindshare. Peter Todd ‚Äòrevealed‚Äô as Satoshi by HBO. US government able to sell $4.4bn Silk Road BTC. Ireland unable to access $378m seized BTC. SOL could do 5x if Trump wins: StanChart. Coinbase integrates Taproot addresses for BTC. Canary Capital applies for XRP ETF. S. Korea to regulate stablecoin transfers. CryptoCom files countersuit against SEC. Babylon fills cap with 22k BTC. Scroll airdrop coming Oct 22nd. USDC goes live on SUI.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces from $59K, Tesla unveils Robotaxis, Memecoins Outperform
entry.summary: BTC briefly dips under $59k, $160m liquidations. Mt Gox extends repayment plan by 1 year. Uniswap plans L2 for DeFi. SEC sues crypto trading firm Cumberland. Binomial sues SEC over futures trading. SEC‚Äôs Uyeda criticises agency‚Äôs policy. Justin Sun named prime minister of Liberland. MicroStrategy wants to become BTC bank. Binance pre-market trading goes live. Nearly 50% of US investors want crypto ETFs. Whale phished for $35m crypto. Ethena invests $46m in RWA funds. Trump‚Äôs crypto project aims to raise $300m.

entry.title: Decentraland Desktop Client Preview
entry.summary: Ethereum metaverse game Decentraland has shared an exclusive look at the visual and performance upgrades coming via its new desktop client.

entry.title: Crypto Trader Murad Mahmudov talks about the Supercycle and how he chooses Meme Coins.
entry.summary: Crypto Trader Murad Mahmudov talks about the Supercycle and how he chooses Meme Coins. Crypto stable, had sold off after China stocks fall. Crypto adopted faster than other tech: BlackRock. Crypto adoption to hit 8% of world population. CryptoCom recieves Wells notice from SEC. HBO documentary on Satoshi airs tonight. FTX bankruptcy plan approved by judge. Scroll airdrop may be imminent. Jupiter goes live on mobile iOS. Phantom rolls out support for Base. AAVE launches GHO on Base. Gensler may be replaced by Robinhood CLO. 87% of new token launches on SOL. National Bank of Bahrain creates BTC fund. BedRock DeFi allows BTC staking on ARB.

entry.title: Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising!
entry.summary: FOMO HOUR EP213. Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising! Many altcoins & memecoins soar despite stable BTC. Funding rates continue to be low or negative. Crypto funds saw $147m of outflows last week. BTC remains best performing major assets this year. SUI breaks into the top 20 coins again. TAO leads top 100 away from memes, sifu shorts. $100m bridge to SOL over the last 7 days. Metaplanet buys $6.7m more BTC. ETH proposal aims to improve throughput 50%. EIGEN, OP, APT lead token unlocks this week.

entry.title: How Walrus Protocol Unlocks New Applications for Decentralized Data Storage
entry.summary: Mysten Labs Chief Scientist George Danezis joined Decrypt to talk about its new decentralized storage protocol Walrus, which promises to unlock new applications such as AI and social media, thanks to its novel Red Stuff data encoding algorithm.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Sees Crypto as a Bipartisan, 'Purple' Political Issue
entry.summary: Coinbase VP of Corporate and Business Development, Shan Aggarwal, joined Decrypt's Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss the exchange's efforts to grow mainstream crypto adoption‚Äîand how the changing political conversation around digital assets is rapidly playing a major role in that.

entry.title: Binance Is Playing Offense‚ÄîNot Just Defense‚ÄîAgainst Crypto Crime, Says Head of Financial Investigations
entry.summary: Nils Anderson R√∂ed, the exchange‚Äôs global head of financial investigations, sat down with Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss how Binance is proactively dismantling criminal networks around the world, the strategy with which the crypto exchange is approaching sensitive conflicts in the Middle East, and more.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 212 - SEEDPHRASE TALKS ART!
entry.summary: Payrolls Higher than expected, Bitcoin reacts hard. Crypto sank early in the week as Middle East tensions spooked markets. Powell signals two more rate cuts this year. SUI leads L1s again, nears YTD high despite large unlock. Majority of FTX repayments still months away. EIGEN becomes non-transferable, hits $6bn FDV. SEC to appeal Ripple securities law ruling. Visa launches tokenization platform for banks. SWIFT plans digital asset trial in 2025. ByBit launched trading of global stock indices. SPX, GIGA & FWOG hit ATHs, most memes fall. XCOPY to release 250 piece collection on Shape. HBO documentary claims to have identified Satoshi.
